metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10241 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Eclipse Jetty version 9.2.26 and older, 9.3.25 and older, and 9.4.15 and older, the server is vulnerable to XSS conditions if a remote client USES a specially formatted URL against the DefaultServlet or ResourceHandler that is configured for showing a Listing of directory contents.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10241` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

jetty9 - 9.4.18-2build2
libjetty9-extra-java - 9.4.18-2build2
libjetty9-java - 9.4.18-2build2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jetty9 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.4.18-2build2').
